Articles.Content: I've just installed the 1.4.3 patch and now I find that none of my solar panels are provinding power.  Both flat and folding panels show 0.0 sun exposure even when in full sun.  Is this a bug or just me?

Are they  modded parts ? Are the clipped into anything?

 

please provide some images.
It's the Koperniucus mod, I removed it and the problem has gone.

Ah yes. Didn’t see that until after this.

glad you figured it out
